item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Alex! I work on low-level vision problems, particularly super-resolution and other inverse problems. I’m also interested in probabilistic deep learning and its applications to remote sensing. Education Link to heading (ongoing) PhD in computer vision, Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing group, ETH Zurich M.Sc. in informatics, TU Munich B.Sc. in informatics, TU Munich Experience Link to heading (ongoing) Research Assistant, ETH Zurich, Zurich Research Intern, Disney Research, Zurich Machine Learning Engineer, Netfira, Munich

item.title: Research
item.description: 2025 Link to heading Thera: Aliasing-Free Arbitrary-Scale Super-Resolution with Neural Heat Fields A. Becker* , R. C. Daudt*, D. Narnhofer, T. Peters, N. Metzger, J. D. Wegner, K. Schindler (*equal contrib.) arXiv preprint 2024 Link to heading Marigold-DC: Zero-Shot Monocular Depth Completion with Guided Diffusion M. Viola, K. Qu, N. Metzger, B. Ke, A. Becker, K. Schindler, A. Obukhov arXiv preprint LoRA-Ensemble: Efficient Uncertainty Modelling for Self-attention Networks M. Halbheer, D.
